Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Deep circular dish. The interior surface is black and smooth, whereas the outside surface is red, except at the border which is also black, and shows a heavy burnish that created a rippled effect (hence "rippled ware"). The gloss of the smoothened polish surface is visible only in certain areas. The lip shows an oblique "dents de loup" design ("wolf's teeth" motif).
